channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1119; 03:34PM; 12632 W Oxnard St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43LmLLO; Valley Glen; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. There are multiple single family dwellings on the property. The original fire unit was well involved and it extended to the attic of one of the exposed homes. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E298 E60 E86 E89 EA1 RA41 T60 T89 T98; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1119; 03:10PM; 12632 W Oxnard St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43LmLLO; Valley Glen; A back house on the property is well involved and exposing an additional single family dwelling. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E298 E60 E86 E89 RA41 T60 T89 T98; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 07/27/2023 INC#1011

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#1011; 03:18PM; Eb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rLksLN; Granada Hills; All Forward Progress Stopped: Approximately 1/4 acre of grass was burning on the south side of the 118 FY x Balboa. That fire jumped the freeway and was at 3/4 acre on the north side, threatening structures. Firefighters extinguished all fire with no structures damaged and no injuries reported. Crews are remaining on scene to conduct mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. Evening commute will likely be affected and drivers are advised to check for alternate routes and CHP for closure updates. No further details.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 CE83 CM40 CM42 CW3A CW3B E100 E103 E104 E107 E18 E2 E273 E275 E28 E287 E289 E290 E296 E305 E72 E73 E75 E77 E8 E87 EM15 EM17 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA83 T105 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T96 WT77; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1011; 02:43PM; Eb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rLksLN; Granada Hills; Initially received as a grass fire, due to the location of the fire near the mutual threat zone the incident was upgraded to a Brush fire response. The size up was 50' x 200' and there is no update. Balboa at the 118 FY is shut down and commuters are advised to seek alternate routes. LAFD apparatus are operating off the shoulder of the freeway. The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:02PM.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 CW3A CW3B E100 E103 E104 E107 E18 E2 E273 E275 E28 E287 E289 E290 E296 E305 E72 E73 E75 E77 E8 E87 EM15 EM17 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA83 T105 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T96 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - Hollywood; INC#0993; 03:09PM; 5666 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/454I0cz; Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to the room of origin, preventing it from extending to the attic or adjoining units. Building type updated to a three-plex with two units on the first floor and one unit on the 2nd floor. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E35 E52 E82 RA35 RA835 T27 T35; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - Valley Glen 07/26/2023 INC#0966

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire - Valley Glen; INC#0966; 03:04PM; 13219 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OvSpJ7; Valley Glen; KNOCKDOWN: 20 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters made entry to the attic and determined the fire was in the walls and had not extended up into the attic. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC11 BC14 E75 E88 RA102 RA77 T60; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Hollywood; INC#0993; 02:54PM; 5666 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/454I0cz; Hollywood; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing from one room. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E52 E82 RA35 RA835 T27; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0966; 02:44PM; 13217 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44zzhzr; Valley Glen; One story single family dwelling with a working attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E75 E88 RA102 T60; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire - Assisting Agency; INC#0889; 02:01PM; 21050 Burbank Bl Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ydft2C; Woodland Hills; LAFD resources are responding to a request from LACoFD for additional resources. The size up from LACoFD is 1/2 acre in medium to heavy brush with a moderate rate of spread/winds. ALL further incident information will come from LACoFD and all media questions are referred to their agency.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AO1 BC17 BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 DZ45 E19 E23 E263 E269 E290 E37 E59 E69 E90 EM9 H2 H3 H4 H7 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA7 HE1 RA69 T63 T69 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0124; 02:20AM; Wb 10 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Khb9JL; Palms; Vehicle went over embankment and landed in encampment with a total of five patients. Three patients extricated from the vehicle and transported in *at least* serious condition. Two patients transported in fair condition. Ages/genders unknown. Any media questions are referred to CHP Log # 198 and LAPD Inc# 0336; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E261 E292 E294 E43 E58 E61 E94 EM1 EM11 EM9 RA43 RA58 RA61 RA68 RA858 RA894 RA94 T26 T61 T92 T94; CH4; 12; Margaret Stewart
